about:
Vincent Frattaroli is a 45-year-old senior politician who enjoys jigsaw puzzles, relaxing and travelling. He is brave and gentle, but can also be very standoffish and a bit unkind.

He is French. He has a post-graduate degree in philosophy, politics and economics. He has a severe phobia of flying

Gilles Grousset is a 42-year-old government politician who enjoys watching sport, bowling and relaxing. He is brave and gentle, but can also be very standoffish and a bit unkind.

He is French. He has a post-graduate degree in philosophy, politics and economics. He is allergic to wasps. He is obsessed with Star Wars.

David Yang Thomas is a 32-year-old senior politician who enjoys football, bowling and painting. He is bright and stable, but can also be very pessimistic and a bit impatient.

He is a Hmong Jedi. He has a post-graduate degree in philosophy, politics and economics. He is allergic to milk.

Physically, David is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with pale skin, white hair and black eyes.

Mickaël Laloum Patel is a 32-year-old kitchen assistant who enjoys painting, swimming and watching television. He is exciting and creative, but can also be very rude and a bit untidy.

He is a French Jedi. He has a post-graduate degree in food science.

role: iOS Developer / Author of JMO libraries
about:
Jerôme Morissard Thomas is a 35-year-old CEO who enjoys recycling, attending museums and meditation. He is stable and giving, but can also be very pessimistic and a bit untidy.

He is a French Christian. He has a post-graduate degree in business studies. He has a severe phobia of mice, and is obsessed with creating playlists.

Gaël Foppolo Miller is a 16-year-old teenager who enjoys travelling, binge-watching boxed sets and tennis. He is considerate and smart, but can also be very cowardly and a bit moody.

He is Italian. He is currently at school.

Physically, Gaël is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with pale skin, red hair and blue eyes.

He lives in a working class neighbourhood. His father walked out 13 years ago, leaving his mother, an electrician Dante, to look after him.
